title: AngoraSix Methodology Guide
subtitle: A comprehensive guide to implementing fair and effective project management.
description: This guide adapts to your project's characteristics, showing you the most relevant activities and tools at each stage. Configure your project profile on the right to see personalized recommendations.

presets.title: Quick Presets
presets.tooltip: Pre-configured scenarios that automatically set the most relevant aspects for common project types. You can adjust individual settings after selecting a preset.

startup.label: Early Startup
startup.tooltip: New product, small team, core ownership, closed development, no revenue yet. Focus on validation and basic structure.

venture.label: Mature Venture
venture.tooltip: Validated product, experienced management, core team structure, stable revenue. Focus on optimization and growth.

community.label: Open Community
community.tooltip: New collaborative project, decentralized governance, open to contributors, community-driven development.

subproject.label: Sub-project
subproject.tooltip: Part of larger organization, validated approach, centralized admin, stable funding and processes.

traditional.label: Traditional Manager
traditional.tooltip: Established product, mature management, centralized control, stable revenue, traditional corporate structure.

product.label: Product
product.tooltip: Current state of your product or service

openness.label: Openness
openness.tooltip: Level of openness to external contributors

alignment.title: 1. Alignment
alignment.description: Establish team readiness, align expectations, and validate the project foundation before diving into implementation.

setup.title: 2. Project Setup
setup.description: Define governance rules, financial structures, and set up the tools and integrations needed for smooth operations.

implementation.title: 3. Implementation & Iterative Revision
implementation.description: Execute agile ceremonies, distribute value, and continuously revise processes, metrics, and governance to evolve the project.

fairness-assessment.title: Fairness Assessment
fairness-assessment.description: Evaluate the current and desired fairness levels within the project to establish a baseline for equitable practices.
objectives: Identify potential inequities in current structure
Create a shared understanding of fairness principles

team-readiness.title: Team Readiness
team-readiness.description: Assess the team's preparedness to embark on a new project, including skills, motivation, and availability.

team-alignment.title: Team Alignment
team-alignment.description: Align team members on project vision, goals, values, and working principles to ensure everyone is moving in the same direction.
objectives: Align on core values and principles
Establish common goals and success criteria

management-definition.title: Management Definition
management-definition.description: Define the management structure, roles, responsibilities, and decision-making processes for the project.

product-prevalidation.title: Product Pre-validation
product-prevalidation.description: Validate the product idea, market opportunity, and initial assumptions before committing significant resources.

product-analysis.title: Product Analysis
product-analysis.description: Analyze the validated product to identify optimization opportunities, growth strategies, and improvement areas.

trainings.title: Trainings
trainings.description: Provide necessary training to team members on methodology, tools, and best practices for effective collaboration.
objectives: Upskill on relevant tools and practices

governance-rules.title: A6 Governance Rules
governance-rules.description: Establish clear governance rules for decision-making, conflict resolution, and power distribution within the project.

financial-rules.title: A6 Financial Rules
financial-rules.description: Define financial management rules, including revenue distribution, expense allocation, and budget management.

contribution-integrations.title: A6 Contribution Integrations
contribution-integrations.description: Integrate project management and development tools to automatically track contributions and calculate ownership.

shared-wallet-setup.title: A6 Shared Wallet Setup
shared-wallet-setup.description: Set up a shared wallet for managing project funds, enabling transparent financial management and automated distributions.

management-tools-setup.title: Management Tools Setup
management-tools-setup.description: Set up and configure project management tools, including task tracking, sprint planning, and agile workflows.

metrics-setup.title: Metrics Setup
metrics-setup.description: Define and set up key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics to track project health, progress, and success.

job-marketplace.title: A6 Job Marketplace
job-marketplace.description: Enable the job marketplace to attract external contributors and facilitate open collaboration on project tasks.

agile-ceremonies.title: Agile Methodology Ceremonies
agile-ceremonies.description: Implement agile ceremonies such as sprint planning, daily standups, reviews, and retrospectives for continuous improvement.

ownership-revision.title: A6 Ownership Revision
ownership-revision.description: Regularly review and update ownership distribution based on ongoing contributions and agreed-upon rules.

income-distribution.title: A6 Income Distribution
income-distribution.description: Execute income distribution based on ownership percentages and financial rules, ensuring fair compensation.

governance.title: Governance
governance.description: Implement governance processes, including voting on decisions, proposals, and changes to project rules.

ownership-reports.title: A6 Ownership Reports
ownership-reports.description: Generate and review ownership reports to maintain transparency and keep all stakeholders informed.

financial-reports.title: A6 Financial Reports
financial-reports.description: Generate and review financial reports, including income, expenses, distributions, and budget status.

rules-revision.title: A6 Rules Revision
rules-revision.description: Periodically review and update project rules, including governance, financial, and operational policies.

health-metrics.title: Health Metrics
health-metrics.description: Monitor team and project health metrics to identify issues early and maintain a positive work environment.

general-roadmap.title: General Roadmap Revision
general-roadmap.description: Review and update the project roadmap to align with current goals, market conditions, and team capacity.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Our team of experts can guide you through implementing the AngoraSix Methodology in your project.
